memories.name: Documentation Practice
memories.episode_body: Enjoy writing clear API documentation. Using OpenAPI/Swagger for all endpoints. Positive feedback from frontend team motivates me to maintain high documentation standards.

memories.name: David Patel - Associate Backend Engineer
memories.episode_body: David Patel is Associate Backend Engineer on Backend Team at TechFlow Solutions, reporting to Alice Chen. Excels at API design and building RESTful services with clear documentation. 2 years backend engineering experience.

memories.name: API Documentation Standards
memories.episode_body: All APIs documented using OpenAPI 3.0 specification. Documentation includes: endpoint descriptions, request/response schemas, example payloads, error codes and meanings, authentication requirements. Generates interactive Swagger UI for testing. Frontend team uses this for integration.

memories.name: Order Management API
memories.episode_body: Built order management API with endpoints: POST /orders (create), GET /orders/:id (retrieve), GET /orders (list with pagination), PATCH /orders/:id (update status). Implements filtering by status, date range, user. Returns order details with line items and payment info.
